title: Anne of Green Gables: The Sequel
brief_description: Multi-award winning “Anne of Green Gables: The Sequel” continues the charming story of Anne Shirley, now an attractive and high spirited 18 year old whose life is brimming with romantic dreams, comic mishaps and adventure that will delight the whole family. Based on three books by Lucy Maud Montgomery: “Anne of Avonlea”, “Anne of the Island” and “Anne of Windy Poplars”.
